title: Big Winners: UCI Esports World Champions Take Home More Cash Than Tadej Pogačar and Lotte Kopecky
content:
Prize fund from Saturday’s championship races provide greater rewards to medalists than recent road world champs.

Read the full article at Big Winners: UCI Esports World Champions Take Home More Cash Than Tadej Pogačar and Lotte Kopecky on Velo.
author: sstokes
